query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_keywords,
  COALESCE(SUM(impressions), 0) as total_impressions,
  COALESCE(SUM(clicks), 0) as total_clicks,
  COALESCE(SUM(CAST(spend AS DECIMAL(12,2))), 0) as total_spend,
  COALESCE(SUM(CAST(sales AS DECIMAL(12,2))), 0) as total_sales,
  COALESCE(SUM(orders), 0) as total_orders
FROM keywords;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user GdNjKxkKZgeVtwE.root --database 5MUJ5aHkiAehb9iTzNdxTq --execute SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_keywords,
  COALESCE(SUM(impressions), 0) as total_impressions,
  COALESCE(SUM(clicks), 0) as total_clicks,
  COALESCE(SUM(CAST(spend AS DECIMAL(12,2))), 0) as total_spend,
  COALESCE(SUM(CAST(sales AS DECIMAL(12,2))), 0) as total_sales,
  COALESCE(SUM(orders), 0) as total_orders
FROM keywords;
